thread.title: Celtic's Moussa Dembele has scored SIX goals in his last 88 minutes of football
thread.title_full: Celtic's Moussa Dembele has scored SIX goals in his last 88 minutes of football

author: Mark Jones
title: Celtic's Moussa Dembele has scored SIX goals in his last 88 minutes of football
text:
Sport Celtic's Moussa Dembele has scored SIX goals in his last 88 minutes of football The young Frenchman has been a transfer target for plenty of Premier League clubs, and given his form it is easy to see why Share Man on fire (Photo: Getty) Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It is easy to knock the Scottish Premiership, but whatever you think of the standard then you have to say that this is pretty special. 
Celtic forward Moussa Dembele has enjoyed a fine first campaign in the division since joining from Fulham, scoring 26 goals in all competitions as he's led the line for Brendan Rodgers' soon-to-be title winners. 
The 20-year-old has caught the attention of plenty of Premier League clubs, and his form in his last two games makes it easy to see why. Will he wave goodbye in the summer? (Photo: Ian MacNicol) Brendan's a big fan (Photo: 2016 Getty Images) 
Because after coming on as a 59th minute substitute in last weekend's clash at St Johnstone, Dembele rattled in a hat-trick, and THEN he followed that up with three more goals inside an hour in the clash with Inverness on Saturday. Moussa Dembele's last two games Minutes played
